Other Information.Test Conditions: Room temperature, 100 sccm total flow rate
Other Information.Additional Info: The hydrogen molecule is small enough to pass through the ZIF-8 shell layer and reach the active PdO centers.
The methanol molecule is too large to pass through the ZIF-8 shell layer and reach the active PdO centers.
The isopropanol molecule is too large to pass through the ZIF-8 shell layer and reach the active PdO centers.

Sieving Mechanism: Molecular sieving effect of the microporous ZIF-8 shell layer with a pore size of 0.34 nm

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: t90 response time reduced from 44 min (PdO/ZnO) to 2.9 min (PdO/ZnO@ZIF-8)

Other Information.Additional Info: The ZIF-8 encapsulation enhances selectivity to hydrogen against larger interferents and accelerates hydrogen sorption kinetics.
